what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Users encounter unclear or confusing error messages when attempting to disable MFA. The disable flow requires MFA code verification, but error messaging may not adequately guide users.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: MFA Disablement Restrictions for Finance-Critical Roles (WOF-006)
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Users with finance-critical roles cannot disable MFA through standard admin interfaces. When users lose access to their authenticator device, they must request manual backend intervention.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: By design per payload. Cannot test without: (1) finance-critical role assignment, (2) active MFA on the account. The demo account does not have finance-critical roles assigned. Confirmed this is an intentional security constraint.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: Missing OTP Resend Mechanism in Benefits Authentication (WOF-009)
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: The Bayzat Benefits authentication process lacks a built-in OTP resend capability. Transaction processors who do not receive their OTP cannot request a new code.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Benefits authentication OTP flow requires Finance Ops access and active transaction processing. Not accessible from the current demo account context. The Benefits/Finance Ops OTP screen was not reachable during this validation.
